hook_visual_note: Quick cuts: someone falling, a rejection letter, then a determined eye.
buildup: JK Rowling's first Harry Potter book? Rejected 12 times. Michael Jordan? Cut from his high school team, missed thousands of shots. He said, 'I've failed over and over again in my life. That's why I succeed.'
buildup_visual_note: Quick cuts: rejection letter pile, basketball flying past hoop, then Jordan's determined face.
punchline: They didn't let failures define them. They let them *teach* them. Every mistake shows you what to do differently. You become good by working hard, not by being perfect.
punchline_visual_note: Person overcoming obstacle, then confident gaze. Text: 'LEARN. ADAPT. CONQUER.'
full_rewritten: Failure is your secret weapon. JK Rowling's first Harry Potter book? Rejected 12 times. Michael Jordan? Cut from his high school team, missed thousands of shots. He said, 'I've failed over and over again in my life. That's why I succeed.' They didn't let failures define them. They let them *teach* them. Every mistake shows you what to do differently. You become good by working hard, not by being perfect.
